org.synyx.mojo.opencms.helper

Class MavenPlexusLoggerWrapper

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.codehaus.plexus.logging.AbstractLogger
      • org.synyx.mojo.opencms.helper.MavenPlexusLoggerWrapper
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.codehaus.plexus.logging.Logger

    public class MavenPlexusLoggerWrapper
extends org.codehaus.plexus.logging.AbstractLogger
    This class wraps a Maven-Plugin-Logger to a Plexus-Logger
    Author:
    macmac
